posts.post_title: Wtt: T206 john mcgraw sgc 80 sovereign 460
posts.post_content: Glove on hip, card is perfectly centered. I know there are many sov. 460 collectors on the board, hoping to trade for high end t206. Scans available, just send me your email. Thanks
